title: Update AngularJS Admin UI Page copy
description:
At https://wiki.apache.org/solr/AngularUI which is linked to from the "i" icon next to the "user original UI" link in upper right.

The component "Web gui" does not exist in the SOLR project.

comments.content: The 'i' icon is gone since the old UI was removed, so this issue doesn't need any further work.
comments.author: Cassandra Targett
